__e: I'd wish that I could live my life moment by moment, enjoying it for what it is instead of... instead of worrying about what it isn't.
I wish I could say I'd done as much with my life as you have with yours
- I wish I could do what you do, make something out of nothing, instead of always the other way around.
- No no no. No, I mean the guy that wishes they were a couple.
On the contrary, I would wish for it no other way.
I wish it was Saturday night so I could take a bath.
Actually, I wish you weren't here at all, that you were safe away.
Am I supposed to believe you have cancer or... yeah, the cancer's legit.
I wish not to worry so much if this girl would be normal.
You know, she wishes that... she hadn't done that... told your kid that you're dead.
She said she wishes you were her mom, which makes me so glad to hear, especially now that I may not...
There is one man who... more than anyone else, I wish could have seen this day.
I'm saying, wouldn't you just wish that for her, for her life?

I wouldn't wish it upon my worst enemy, it's an awful thing to happen to anyone, but I do laugh whenever there's like, a house fire or a car accident, or something like that, and someone gets really badly burned, and the news read'll be like,
I hope he's the last to die down there, alone... with the ghosts of his past for company.
Man, I never thought I'd say this, but I wish there were more people to share this with.
The second I said that, I wished I hadn't. I-I'm really sorry.
You look at me and see everything you wish you were..., ...everything you could have been today.
Because... There's a lot of times when I'm at home and I just don't want to be.
And I know so many things about you I wish I could un-know.
Knowing the things I wish I didn't know and not knowing the things I wish I did.
